-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Client for fetching Twitter timeline via Oauth
--   
@package twitter-feed
@version 0.2.0.0


-- | Types for working with the twitter API.
module Web.Twitter.Types

-- | Represent a tweet as plain text
data Tweet
Tweet :: String -> String -> String -> Entities -> Tweet

-- | Tweet content as plain text
text :: Tweet -> String

-- | Tweet created at date
createdAt :: Tweet -> String

-- | Tweet id
idStr :: Tweet -> String

-- | All references mentioned on the tweet
entities :: Tweet -> Entities

-- | Represents a tweet as HTML
data SimpleTweet
SimpleTweet :: String -> String -> String -> SimpleTweet

-- | Tweet content as HTML
body :: SimpleTweet -> String

-- | Tweet id
tweetId :: SimpleTweet -> String

-- | Tweet created at date
created_at :: SimpleTweet -> String

-- | Represent a link as HTML
data Link
Link :: Int -> Int -> String -> Link

-- | Tweet start index
startIndex :: Link -> Int

-- | Tweet end index
endIndex :: Link -> Int

-- | Link as HTML
newHtml :: Link -> String

-- | Represent a list of all tweet references
data Entities
Entities :: [UserEntity] -> [URLEntity] -> [MediaEntity] -> Entities

-- | List of all user references mentioned on the tweet
userEntities :: Entities -> [UserEntity]

-- | List of all urls references mentioned on the tweet
urlEntities :: Entities -> [URLEntity]

-- | List of all media references mentioned on the tweet
mediaEntities :: Entities -> [MediaEntity]

-- | Represent a url reference
data URLEntity
URLEntity :: String -> BoundingIndices -> String -> URLEntity

-- | Reference title
urlMessage :: URLEntity -> String

-- | Tweet start and end index
urlIndices :: URLEntity -> BoundingIndices

-- | Reference url
displayUrl :: URLEntity -> String

-- | Represent a user reference
data UserEntity
UserEntity :: String -> BoundingIndices -> UserEntity

-- | User twitter name
screenName :: UserEntity -> String

-- | Tweet start and end index
userIndices :: UserEntity -> BoundingIndices

-- | Represent a media reference
data MediaEntity
MediaEntity :: String -> BoundingIndices -> String -> MediaEntity

-- | Reference url
mediaUrl :: MediaEntity -> String

-- | Tweet start and end index
mediaIndices :: MediaEntity -> BoundingIndices

-- | Reference title
displayMediaUrl :: MediaEntity -> String
instance Show SimpleTweet
instance Generic SimpleTweet
instance Show UserEntity
instance Generic UserEntity
instance Show URLEntity
instance Generic URLEntity
instance Show MediaEntity
instance Generic MediaEntity
instance Show Entities
instance Generic Entities
instance Show Tweet
instance Generic Tweet
instance Show Link
instance Eq Link
instance Datatype D1SimpleTweet
instance Constructor C1_0SimpleTweet
instance Selector S1_0_0SimpleTweet
instance Selector S1_0_1SimpleTweet
instance Selector S1_0_2SimpleTweet
instance Datatype D1UserEntity
instance Constructor C1_0UserEntity
instance Selector S1_0_0UserEntity
instance Selector S1_0_1UserEntity
instance Datatype D1URLEntity
instance Constructor C1_0URLEntity
instance Selector S1_0_0URLEntity
instance Selector S1_0_1URLEntity
instance Selector S1_0_2URLEntity
instance Datatype D1MediaEntity
instance Constructor C1_0MediaEntity
instance Selector S1_0_0MediaEntity
instance Selector S1_0_1MediaEntity
instance Selector S1_0_2MediaEntity
instance Datatype D1Entities
instance Constructor C1_0Entities
instance Selector S1_0_0Entities
instance Selector S1_0_1Entities
instance Selector S1_0_2Entities
instance Datatype D1Tweet
instance Constructor C1_0Tweet
instance Selector S1_0_0Tweet
instance Selector S1_0_1Tweet
instance Selector S1_0_2Tweet
instance Selector S1_0_3Tweet
instance Ord Link
instance FromJSON MediaEntity
instance ToJSON MediaEntity
instance FromJSON URLEntity
instance ToJSON URLEntity
instance FromJSON UserEntity
instance ToJSON UserEntity
instance FromJSON Entities
instance ToJSON Entities
instance FromJSON Tweet
instance ToJSON Tweet
instance ToJSON SimpleTweet


-- | Functions for fetching (and linkifying) timelines of Twitter users.
module Web.Twitter.Feed

-- | Get and decode a user timeline.
timeline :: OAuth -> Credential -> Int -> Bool -> String -> IO (Either String [SimpleTweet])

-- | Add a link to the text of a tweet.
addLink :: Link -> String -> String

-- | Returns the URL for requesting a user timeline.
timelineUrl :: String -> Int -> Bool -> String

-- | Sort lists of URL, user mention, and media entities.
sortLinks :: [URLEntity] -> [UserEntity] -> [MediaEntity] -> [Link]
